content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, it's my pleasure to show you the apartment. I'm sure you'll find it quite suitable for your needs. How much were you thinking of offering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. The apartment seems to be in a great location and quite new. I was hoping we could negotiate a fair price that would be beneficial for both of us. Would you consider a lower rent, say, 800 Euros per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 800 Euros per month is much lower than the market value for such a prime location. I would expect at least 1200 Euros per month for this apartment. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's quite a high starting point, Mr. Schmidt. I understand the location is excellent, but considering it's unfurnished, I was hoping for a more reasonable price. Would you be willing to lower the rent to 950 Euros per month? I believe it's a fair compromise.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 950 Euros per month is still below my expectations, but since you seem to be a serious tenant, I'm willing to make an exception. However, I would like to include a few conditions to ensure the apartment is well-maintained. Are you open to discussing these terms?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Certainly, Mr. Schmidt, I'm open to discussing any terms that are fair and reasonable. Please tell me about the conditions you have in mind, and I will do my best to meet them.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Excellent, Mr. Wang. First, I require a one-year lease with an option to renew. Second, I expect the rent to be paid in full and on time each month. Third, any damages beyond normal wear and tear will be charged to the tenant. Are these conditions acceptable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, Mr. Schmidt, these conditions are acceptable to me. I'm looking forward to a long and fruitful relationship as your tenant. With these terms in place, I believe 950 Euros per month is a fair price for the apartment. How about we agree on this amount?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm glad to hear that, Mr. Wang. Your willingness to agree to these terms shows that you are a reliable tenant. I agree to the price of 950 Euros per month! Let's move forward with the lease agreement. Is there anything else we need to discuss before we finalize the contract?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No, Mr. Schmidt, I believe we have covered everything. I'm ready to sign the lease agreement once you provide it. Thank you for your time and for reaching a fair agreement. I look forward to a positive landlord-tenant relationship.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Wonderful, Mr. Wang. I'm pleased to have you as a tenant. I will send you the lease agreement as soon as possible. Once you've reviewed it and are ready to sign, we can arrange a meeting to finalize the paperwork. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No, Mr. Schmidt, thank you for your assistance. I'm looking forward to receiving the lease agreement. Once I've read it over, I'll let you know if I have any questions. Otherwise, I'm ready to sign and begin the lease. Thank you again for your time and effort in reaching a fair agreement.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Mr. Wang. I'm glad we were able to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I'll send the lease agreement to you shortly. If you have any questions or need assistance with anything else, please don't hesitate to contact me. Enjoy your new home!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I'm sure I'll enjoy living in the apartment. I'll contact you as soon as I've reviewed the lease agreement. Have a nice day!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: You too, Mr. Wang. I look forward to our future cooperation. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
